readable.title: 2484190118_e89363c465
readable.content: A boy with his hands above his head stands on a cement pillar above the cobblestones . A child in colorful shorts is standing on a post in the street . A small boy stands on a cement stump in a park with his hands on his head . a young man wearing a white t-shirt and green and black shorts standing on a stump . Small child in white shirt and print shorts with hands over their head standing on object .
